com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition

Class SimpleCompositeService<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition.AbstractCompositeService<I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition.SimpleCompositeService<I,O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<I,O>

    public class SimpleCompositeService<I extends Request,O extends Response>
extends AbstractCompositeService<I,O>
    A general purpose AbstractCompositeService implementation. Useful when you do not want to define a new dedicated Service type.

      • serviceAt

        public <T extends Service<? super I,? extends O>> T serviceAt(int index)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCompositeService
        Returns the index-th Service in this composite Service. The index of the Service added first is 0, and so on.

      • findService

        public PathMapped<Service<? super I,? extends O>> findService(String path)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCompositeService
        Finds the Service whose PathMapping matches the path.
        Overrides:
        findService in class AbstractCompositeService<I extends Request,O extends Response>
        Returns:
